page.title: 15Games Children Play
page.content: I am a nine year old boy and I live in Shenstone. The games children play are the same as they used to be but some are new. Rounders has been going for a long time. The main idea is to get round all four posts without being caught or stumped out. I asked all 29 children in my class which games they liked best out of 17 games. Here they are in order of popularity starting with the favourite rounders was the most popular, swimming next, then monopoly the rest were not popular. Computers are new games to play with but you need a T.V and tape recorder. Board games are good to play with in winter or on rainy nights. Monopoly is a property and trading game. You try to get properties, and when somebody lands on your property they have to pay you rent.Chess is a game of logic and strategy. SIMON KING
